ISSUE.TITLE: [RFE] Workflow approval requests should have a job ID
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE - Feature Idea ##### SUMMARY The user cannot distinguish the waiting approval to proceed. I suppose the job ID of the workflow is needed on each of these item.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Set subscription type as developer for developer subscriptions. (#14584) (#6535) * Set subscription type as developer for developer subscriptions. * Set subscription type as developer for developer subscription manifests. * Remedy the wrong character to assign value. * Reformat licensing.py by black. --------- Signed-off-by: Tong He <the@redhat.com> Co-authored-by: Tong He <68936428+unnecessary-username@users.noreply.github.com>

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Setting credential_type as required (#14651) (#6531) * Setting credential_type as required * Added test for missing credential_type in credential module * Corrected test assertion --------- Co-authored-by: Lucas Benedito <lbenedit@redhat.com>
